2052.subject: ASL
2052.descrlong: A continuation of ASL 201. (Offered spring semester.)

2053.subject: ASL
2053.descrlong: A continuation of ASL 201. (Offered spring semester.)

2054.subject: ASL
2054.descrlong: Continues the study and perfection of intermediate American Sign Language skills. Focuses on perfecting visual comprehension, signing, writing with gloss system, and using basic expressive and receptive skills for real-life settings. Studies readings and videos. Classes and extracurricular activities teach the aspects of ASL and the deaf culture. Requires active participation in instructor-coordinated multimedia and online activities as a mandatory component. (Offered spring semester.)

2233.subject: ASL
2233.descrlong:
Continues the study and perfection of intermediate American Sign Language skills. Focuses on perfecting visual comprehension, signing, writing with gloss system, and using basic expressive and receptive skills for real-life settings. Studies readings and videos. Classes and extracurricular activities teach the aspects of ASL and the deaf culture. Requires active participation in instructor-coordinated multimedia and online activities as a mandatory component. (Offered spring semester.) 

(Prereq: ASL 201)
